Stem: Green and smooth becoming woody at base with age.
Leaves: Opposite sided oval or oblong shaped up to 10 cm long, narrowing at both ends.
Flowers: Small greenish-white flowers clasping closely to a long narrow spike up to 60 cm long.
FruitSeeds: Sharply pointed orange to reddish purple capsules maturing to straw-brown.
Habitat: Urban bushland, disturbed areas, old gardens, grasslands, cropping areas. Native and has a pan-tropical distribution.
